overview: The queen gave birth to a meatball, and the emperor thought it was an evildoer and ordered people to throw it away. But the good man's prime minister took the meat ball into the river and put the jade in the swaddle, hoping that someone would be blessed with a great life. The meat ball was accidentally picked up by 7 generals (that is, dwarves) who were cursed by wizards. After cutting it open, it was a baby girl... Prince Lin got lost in the forest, met the grown girl, and they fell in love at first sight... The wizard controls everything in the country, and also learns from the crystal ball that the girl is the princess who was abandoned in the past, the wizard captured the princess, and the prince, with the help of the little fairy, embarks on the road to find and destroy the wizard's sword...
title: 神劍動山河
